description.value:
Requirements You are wielding a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.wkzxLpSe7LN6c5Ld]{Sawtooth Saber} in each hand.

You've mastered the signature assassination style of the Red Mantis. Attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} an enemy within 30 feet. If your Feint is successful, when you use Prayer Attack on subsequent turns you automatically make the target off-guard against your melee attacks for that turn without rolling a check to Feint, so as long as you remain visible to the target and the target remains within 30 feet of you. If you use your Prayer Attack against a different target, you must attempt to Feint the target normally.

When you use Prayer Attack, your next successful Strike with a sawtooth saber that turn deals @Damage[2d6[bleed]] to the target.
